short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a column to the personal stats page which displays how long it took you to get from part 1 to part 2

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Advent of Code is an Advent calendar of small programming puzzles for a variety of skill sets and skill levels that can be solved in any programming language you like. 

This inserts a new column on the personal stats page: https://adventofcode.com/<year>/self

With version 0.0.3, this extension will also attempt to track the first time you open a puzzle and offset your completion times based off of that start time.

Note: You must generate a private leaderboard in order for the extension to work. See: https://adventofcode.com/<year>/leaderboard/private
